actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-135.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution providing additional funds for expenses of the Committee on International Relations in connection with visits to the United States by Heads of States and other foreign dignitaries.

summary.text: Declares that there shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House such sums as may be necessary to enable the Committee on International Relations to facilitate the interchange and reception in the United States of members of foreign legislative bodies and officials of foreign governments. Amends the Legislative Branch Appropriation Act, 1963, to increase the amount of funds available for such purpose.

titles.title: Resolution providing additional funds for expenses of the Committee on International Relations in connection with visits to the United States by Heads of States and other foreign dignitaries.
